guest_access_info: You have accessed the application as a guest
welcome_text: We are happy to have you here. Explore our project and discover all the features we have to offer. Feel free to navigate as a guest or log in to access more functionalities.
password_updated_successfully: Your password has been updated successfully
reset_password_info: Please enter your username or email to reset your password. We will send you a new password to your email. Please change it immediately after your first login using the
password_must_be_info: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
create_new_user_info: To create a new user, fill in the form below. Please note that you must have administrative privileges to create new users.
view_logs_info: Here you can view all the system logs
admin_panel_info: Welcome to the admin panel. Here you can manage users, view logs, and configure system settings.
system_settings_info: Here you can configure various system settings, such as email settings, notification settings, and more.
permissions_info: Here you can assign permissions to users, allowing them to access different parts of the application.
user_info_info: Here you can view and edit user information, including their username, email, and password.
reset_password_success: Your password has been reset successfully
operator_ui_info: Here you can access the Operator UI, where you can manage logistics and financial operations.
email_new_password: An email with a new password has been sent to your email. We recommend changing it after logging in.
failed_send_email: Failed to send email. Check the correctness of the entered data.
we_will_send_e-mail: We will send you a new password to your email. Please change it immediately after your first login using the 'Reset my password' button. If you have forgotten your login or do not have access to e-mail, please contact the system administrator for help.
please_be_careful: Please be careful. Take care of yourself and Ukraine.
user_list_info: This section will display the user list.
other_info_details: Additional admin tools can be added here.
fill_form_text: Please fill in the form to create a new user account.
blocked_message: Access is denied. Please contact an administrator.
